intro: Basistemon, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its velvety, thick leaves and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows as a small shrub, with stems that can be either upright or trailing. Basistemon prefers bright, indirect light and well-draining soil, making it a popular choice for indoor gardening. Its ability to thrive in controlled environments has made it a favored ornamental plant worldwide.
